The claim was widely circulated on Faceb: with multiple posts sharing the image and accumulating thousands of shares.
Medical experts: including Hallie Prescott, Assistant Professor in the Division of Pulmonary & Critical Care Medicine at the University of Michigan Health System, were consulted to analyze and provide their insights on the claim.
The official advice from the US Centers: CDC) recommends wearing masks or face coverings in situations where social distancing is challenging.
Various medical professionals: including Josh Mugele, an Emergency Department Physician at Northeast Georgia Medical Center, stated that there are no adverse effects to long-term mask usage and that many professions regularly wear masks without experiencing any negative consequences.
